verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Full salvation! Full salvation! Lo, the fountain opened wide, Streams through every land and nation From the Savior’s wounded side. Full salvation! Full salvation! Streams an endless crimson tide.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Oh, the glorious revelation! See the cleansing current flow, Washing stains of condemnation Whiter than the driven snow: Full salvation! Full salvation! Oh, the rapturous bliss to know.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Love’s resistless current sweeping All the regions deep within; Thought, and wish, and senses keeping Now, and every instant, clean: Full salvation! Full salvation! From the guilt and power of sin.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Life immortal, Christ descending, Lo! my heart the Spirit’s shrine: God and man in oneness blending, Oh, what fellowship is mine! Full salvation! Full salvation! Raised in Christ to life divine!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Care and doubting, gloom and sorrow, Fear and shame are mine no more; Faith knows naught of dark tomorrow, For my Savior goes before: Full salvation! Full salvation! Full and free for evermore!
